name: The Only Way Is Up
description:
This game was made in a week because I was super bored. It's a platformer style game, but the only movement is through jumping. The longer you hold your spacebar, the higher you jump, and you need to reach the top in as quick as possible!

--------------------------------

Controls:

- Left/Right = Left Arrow Key/Right Arrow Key

- Jump = Spacebar

- Escape = Pause/exit a window

--------------------------------

I hope you enjoy!
